v1.headline: Lead Backend Engineer | Top 1% Mentor @Topmate | Author | Tech Speaker
v1.about:
Hey! Thanks for visiting my profile.


My name is Rehan Sattar. A Senior Engineer, Author, Mentor, and Public speaker.

With over 5 years of hands-on experience in backend engineering.


My journey in tech has been one of continuous learning and relentless curiosity

Leading me from freelancing to full-time engineering roles, where I craft scalable solutions and share knowledge to elevate others in the tech community.


üîπ My Professional Snapshot

- Speaker: Engaged audiences across 2 conferences, 5 workshops, 4 meetups, and 2 hackathons, sharing my journey and technical insights.

- Top Rated Freelancer on Upwork: Freelancing taught me the importance of adaptability, delivering excellence for clients worldwide.


üõ†Ô∏è My Tech Stack

üí°  To me, software engineering is about impact.
